titleStmt.title: The loves of Amandus and Sophronia, historically narrated a piece of rare contexture, inriched with many pleasing odes and sonnets, occasioned by the jocular or tragicall occurrences hapning in the progresse of the historie : disposed into three books or tracts / by Samuel Sheppard.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, S. (Samuel)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.D. for Iohn Hardestie ...,

notesStmt.note: Title page and p. 140 have print missing in filmed copy. Title page-15 and p. 130-end photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
